channel.title: [PI]interface help and admin control panel help! will donate if help!
channel.description:
Ok guys i have a PI based client and I currently have a rank on my server called House-Ownership and with this it allowes... Players to donate money to buy a house in game witht there house they can add a teleporter that goes anywhere and monsters or object or anything like that but the problem is I have to add all the objects and items. At first it was ok cuz i only had like 2 ppl donate for it and now I have like 10 ppl have houses and it is so much work for me to add object for all the time I was wondering if u could make me a tutorial on how to do this.... if there houseOwnership ==1 they can type a command that will make an interface appear with a list of objects they can spawn in there house and it will permanantely keep them there! If you could make this I will donate to you or do anything u want!!
Also for my PI I really really really want to make my music tab at the bottom right corner an admins tab.. only admins can open the tab and when u open it it looks like this...
Info- type the playername in the box and select a command [ Box to type playername in ] [] ban user [] ip ban user [] mute user [] ipmute user [] promote user [] demote user [] give item to user [] give donator to user
[ Confirm ]
and when the admin types the player name in the box and selects one of the commands and hits confirm it will do one of the commands! if u can make one of these work i will donate a fortune to u and if u can do both omg i would love u!!!! no home If u could give me a tutorial link if u make one i will do my best to help u on anything u need and u will be my frikin idol!!!!!!

item.title: [PI]interface help and admin control panel help! will donate if help!
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

HAH goodluck with that. there not even helping my noobish webclient problem, but yeah goodluck

wow you’re seriously wanting some spoonfeeding here…no offense but there is a thing called trying things yourself…the only way to get better is in trial and error…
ONTOPIC:i cannot help you on this problem…so sorry.

item.title: [PI]interface help and admin control panel help! will donate if help!
item.dc:creator: @z_rowt21 z rowt21
item.description:
@z_rowt21 wrote:

Ok guys i have a PI based client and I currently have a rank on my server called House-Ownership and with this it allowes…
Players to donate money to buy a house in game witht there house they can add a teleporter that goes anywhere and monsters or object or anything like that but the problem is I have to add all the objects and items. At first it was ok cuz i only had like 2 ppl donate for it and now I have like 10 ppl have houses and it is so much work for me to add object for all the time
I was wondering if u could make me a tutorial on how to do this…
if there houseOwnership ==1 they can type a command that will make an interface appear with a list of objects they can spawn in there house and it will permanantely keep them there!
If you could make this I will donate to you or do anything u want!!

Also for my PI I really really really want to make my music tab at the bottom right corner an admins tab…
only admins can open the tab and when u open it it looks like this…

Info- type the playername in the box and select a command
[ Box to type playername in ]
[] ban user [] ip ban user
[] mute user [] ipmute user
[] promote user [] demote user
[] give item to user [] give donator to user

          [ Confirm ]

and when the admin types the player name in the box and selects one of the commands and hits confirm it will do one of the commands!
if u can make one of these work i will donate a fortune to u and if u can do both omg i would love u!!! no home
If u could give me a tutorial link if u make one i will do my best to help u on anything u need and u will be my frikin idol!!!
